statements: SELECT ad_id, ad_name, ad_type FROM ad_creatives;
SELECT ad_name, ad_content, clicks FROM ad_creatives WHERE ad_type = 'image';
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, test_group FROM ad_creatives ORDER BY ad_id DESC;
SELECT ad_name, conversions FROM ad_creatives WHERE clicks > 100;
SELECT * FROM ad_creatives WHERE test_group = 'A' AND ad_type = 'video';
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, ad_type FROM ad_creatives WHERE test_group = 'A';
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, clicks, conversions FROM ad_creatives WHERE ad_type = 'video' ORDER BY conversions DESC;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, ad_content FROM ad_creatives WHERE clicks > 100 AND test_group = 'B';
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, clicks, conversions FROM ad_creatives WHERE conversions > clicks;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, ad_type, test_group, clicks, conversions FROM ad_creatives WHERE test_group = 'B' AND ad_type IN ('image', 'text') ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT * FROM ad_creatives
SELECT ad_id, creative_name, creative_type FROM ad_creatives WHERE clicks > 100
SELECT creative_name, impressions FROM ad_creatives WHERE campaign_id = 12
SELECT ad_id, creative_type FROM ad_creatives ORDER BY clicks DESC
SELECT ad_id, impressions FROM ad_creatives WHERE campaign_id = 5 ORDER BY impressions ASC
SELECT * FROM ad_creatives WHERE ad_id = 10
SELECT creative_name, clicks FROM ad_creatives WHERE impressions > 1000 ORDER BY clicks DESC
SELECT ad_id, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM ad_performance GROUP BY ad_id ORDER BY total_revenue DESC
SELECT campaign_id, AVG(conversion_rate) AS avg_conversion_rate FROM ad_performance GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING AVG(conversion_rate) > 0.5
SELECT creative_name, clicks, impressions, revenue FROM ad_creatives c JOIN ad_performance p ON c.ad_id = p.ad_id WHERE p.date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM ad_creatives;
SELECT ad_name, image_url FROM ad_creatives WHERE active = TRUE;
SELECT id, creative_text, targeting_criteria FROM ad_creatives ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM experiments WHERE experiment_status = 'ongoing';
SELECT experiment_name, revenue_generated FROM experiments INNER JOIN experiment_results ON experiments.id = experiment_results.experiment_id;
SELECT ad_name, image_url FROM ad_creatives WHERE active = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM experiments WHERE experiment_status = 'running' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(revenue_generated) AS max_revenue FROM experiment_results;
SELECT experiment_name, conversion_rate FROM experiments JOIN experiment_results ON experiments.id = experiment_results.experiment_id WHERE engagement_rate > 0.5;
SELECT ad_name, targeting_criteria FROM ad_creatives WHERE targeting_criteria LIKE '%young%' AND active = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT creative_id, creative_name, image_url FROM ad_creatives ORDER BY creative_id DESC;
SELECT variant_name, variant_description FROM ad_variants WHERE creative_id = 2 AND variant_id < 5;
SELECT performance_id, views, clicks, conversions FROM ad_performance WHERE spend > 1000 ORDER BY views DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT creative_name, creative_type FROM ad_creatives WHERE campaign_id = 3;
SELECT variant_name, variant_description FROM ad_variants ORDER BY variant_id DESC;
SELECT performance_id, SUM(views) AS total_views, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks FROM ad_performance GROUP BY performance_id HAVING total_views > 1000;

SELECT ac.creative_name, ap.views, ap.clicks, ap.conversions FROM ad_performance AS ap INNER JOIN ad_variants AS av ON ap.variant_id = av.variant_id INNER JOIN ad_creatives AS ac ON av.creative_id = ac.creative_id WHERE ap.views > 500 ORDER BY ap.clicks DESC;
SELECT * FROM ad_creative LIMIT 5;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaign;
SELECT placement_name, cost, impressions FROM ad_placement ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT variant_name, is_winner FROM ad_variant WHERE creative_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT test_id, variant_id, conversion_rate FROM test_results WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM ad_creative WHERE campaign_id = 'a4f37b23-8b82-4db6-946d-2a027cad7234';
SELECT creative_name, campaign_id FROM ad_creative WHERE variation_id = '78d842b7-e7ef-4cc6-8894-7c6b1a70caad';
SELECT * FROM campaign WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT variant_name, creative_id, is_winner FROM ad_variant WHERE is_winner = TRUE;
SELECT placement_name, cost, impressions FROM ad_placement ORDER BY cost DESC;
